    Fachri Dhia Fauzan

    Software engineer focused on building and monitoring scalable full-stack systems.

    • Indonesia

    Curriculum Vitae

    Software engineer with 2+ years of experience across full-stack development, database design and optimization, infrastructure monitoring, and system optimization. Currently working as a Dynatrace APM Analyst, investigating and reporting application issues. Also building production-ready applications using PHP, Go, and JavaScript frameworks, managing containerized infrastructure and third-party integrations. Experienced in performance monitoring, translating business requirements into efficient database schemas, and troubleshooting complex system issues.

    Professional Experience

    Dynatrace APM Analyst

    PT Astra Graphia Information Technology | Jun 2025 - Present

    • Used Dynatrace to drive deep observability across Telkomsel’s ecosystem, identifying critical performance issues rooted in system architecture rather than just code syntax.
    • Diagnose complex, non-functional bottlenecks including issues from F5, network connectivity, firewall, and infrastructure constraints (CPU, Memory, Disk I/O).
    • Deliver critical Root Cause Analysis and detailed technical reports to Telkomsel’s engineering teams, pinpointing “invisible” points of failure from Dynatrace findings to ensure system stability.

    Software Engineer

    PT Fomo Inovasi Teknologi | Nov 2023 - Present

    • Architected a hybrid full-stack ecosystem, using PHP Yii2 for rapid feature delivery and Go (Golang) to minimize latency, integrated with Next.js/Nuxt.js frontends.
    • Designed and optimized relational database schemas (PostgreSQL), writing efficient queries to support complex data reporting for the admin dashboard.
    • Integrated third-party APIs such as payment gateways and 3rd party logistics, ensuring secure data transmission and seamless user transactions.
    • Managed production infrastructure on Ubuntu, utilizing Docker for containerization and Nginx for proxying, ensuring scalable and consistent deployments.
    • Ensured high system availability by configuring Grafana and Prometheus for real-time monitoring and alerting.
    • Actively participated in requirement gathering sessions alongside business stakeholders, ensuring technical feasibility before implementing features and training end-users.

    Backend and DevOps Engineer Intern

    PT Neural Technologies Indonesia | Sep 2022 - Jan 2023

    • Successfully identified and resolved numerous software bugs, addressed data corruption, improved code cleanliness, filled documentation gaps, and contributed to the program’s stability and usability.
    • Played a crucial role in the deployment of a backend API and CRM web application, ensuring seamless integration and operation.
